title: Ep. 111 "You Name It"
description:
Kiki Said So & Medinah Monroe catch up and share their own thoughts on interracial relationships, why someone who loves black women would shy away from saying so, thanksgiving f*ck ups, coming to terms with what we really want and a bunch of other random thoughts that have been on our minds.
